Package com.yukiemeralis.blogspot.zenith.module

Class ZenithModule

java.lang.Object
com.yukiemeralis.blogspot.zenith.module.ZenithModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoreModule, GuiModule, NetworkingModule, SecurityCore
public abstract class ZenithModule extends Object
Represents a Zenith module.
Author:
Yuki_emeralis

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    ZenithModule.LoadBefore
    Annotation to notify Zenith that this module depends on other modules.
    static interface 
    ZenithModule.ModInfo
    Required annotation for all Zenith modules to set themselves apart from other modules.
    static interface 
    ZenithModule.ZenConfig
    Annotation to notify Zenith that this module has a configuration file.

  • Method Details

    • onEnable

      public abstract void onEnable()
      Runs once when the module is first loaded.

    • onDisable

      public abstract void onDisable()
      Runs once when the module is being unloaded.

    • addListener

      public void addListener​(org.bukkit.event.Listener... listener)
      Add one or more listeners to be registered on startup.
      Parameters:
      listener - Variable argument array of listeners.

    • addCommand

      public void addCommand​(ZenithCommand... command)
      Add one or more commands to be registered on startup.
      Parameters:
      command - Variable argument array of Zenith commands.

    • getIsEnabled

      public boolean getIsEnabled()
      Obtains whether or not this module is enabled.
      Returns:
      If the module is enabled or not.

    • setEnabled

      public void setEnabled()
      Sets this module's state to enabled.

    • setDisabled

      public void setDisabled()
      Sets this module's state to disabled.

      public String getName()
      Obtains this module's name.
      Returns:
      This module's name.

      public String getVersion()
      Obtains this module's version.
      Returns:
      This module's version.

    • getModFamily

      public String getModFamily()
      Obtains this module's family. May not be set.
      Returns:
      This module's family.

    • getConfig

      public Map<String,​String> getConfig()
      Obtains this module's configuration.
      Returns:
      This module's configuration.

    • getListeners

      public List<org.bukkit.event.Listener> getListeners()
      Obtains a list of listeners registered to this module.
      Returns:
      A list of listeners.

    • getCommands

      public List<ZenithCommand> getCommands()
      Obtains a list of Zenith commands registered to this module.
      Returns:
      A list of Zenith commands.

    • getReliantModules

      public List<ZenithModule> getReliantModules()
      Obtains a list of other modules that depend on this module.
      Returns:
      A list of modules.

    • addReliantModule

      public void addReliantModule​(ZenithModule module)
      Adds a module to this module as a reliant.
      Parameters:
      module - The module to add.

    • removeReliantModule

      public void removeReliantModule​(ZenithModule module)
      Removes a reliant module from this module.
      Parameters:
      module - The module to remove.

    • toIcon

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack toIcon()
      Generates an itemstack representation of this module. Please note that this may become deprecated in the future in favor of a GUIComponent.
      Returns:
      This module represented by an itemstack.

    • setInfo

      public void setInfo​(ZenithModule.ModInfo info)
      Applies module info to this module from its ModInfo annotation.
      Parameters:
      info - The annotation containing this module's information.

    • setBlankInfo

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="2.2.0") public void setBlankInfo​(String name)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      As of 2.2.0, all modules must now specify an ZenithModule.ModInfo annotation, rendering this method useless.
      Applies a blank set of info to this module.
      Parameters:
      name - The name generated for this module.

    • loadConfig

      public void loadConfig()
      Loads this module's configuration from a file.

    • saveConfig

      public void saveConfig()
      Saves this module's configuration to a file.
